node.title: Haiti Prime Minister Survives Assassination Attempt, His Office Says
node.alt: Prime Minister Ariel Henry of Haiti speaking at the inauguration ceremony of his culture minister, in Port-au-Prince in November.
node.description: Prime Minister Ariel Henry was the target of an unsuccessful attempt on his life over the weekend by gunmen in the northern city of Gona√Øves, his office said Monday night.
node.content: ["PORT-AU-PRINCE \u2014 Gunmen unsuccessfully attempted to assassinate Prime Minister Ariel Henry of Haiti during an event on Saturday commemorating the Caribbean country\u2019s independence, his office said in a statement on Monday night.", "\u201cBandits and terrorists,\u201d the statement said, had tried to shoot the prime minister at a church in the northern city of Gona\u00efves where the ceremony marking the 218th anniversary of independence was taking place.", "Video footage broadcast on social media showed Mr. Henry and his entourage scrambling toward their vehicles as an armed group began shooting outside the cathedral in Gona\u00efves.", "The police, who called Saturday\u2019s attack the work of \u201carmed groups,\u201d were unable to immediately confirm casualties. Haitian media said the shooting killed one person and injured two more.", "Before the incident, a local gang boss had made threats against Mr. Henry in local media. Criminal gangs\u2019 hold on parts of Haiti has strengthened since the assassination of President Jovenel Mo\u00efse in July.", "The reported assassination attempt over the weekend has renewed concerns about the safety of officials in Haiti since Mr. Mo\u00efse\u2019s assassination.", "Mr. Henry, whose administration is facing mounting challenges to its legitimacy, was sworn in as prime minister barely two weeks after Mr. Mo\u00efse\u2019s killing at the hands of suspected mercenaries. The country has yet to set a date to elect Mr. Moise\u2019s successor."]
